attributes.action: Stop Heathrow, Gatwick and all airports to charge for Drops offs
attributes.background: Stop Heathrow, Gatwick and all UK major airports to charge for Drops off at there passenger drop off and stop being greedy as they are charging ridicules amount of money on each time you visit and fine or issue tickets wan dropping off

rejection.details:
Petitions must call for a specific action that the UK Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about charges for airport services are a matter for individual airports, not the Government or Parliament.

As a result it is not possible for the Government or Parliament to take the action you have requested.
